website_summaries.verdict: A quality hair follicle drug test.
pros: Features pre-paid lab analysis screens for drug use as far back as 90 days
Ideal for non-invasive screening on a routine basis
cons: More expensive than other drug test kits

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Mind
customer_reviews.text: I smoked some weed 6 weeks ago, not much, but enough I was worried. I was extremely nervous about an upcoming hair test for new employment. I purchased this test, followed the instructions, and had the results back within 7 business days. My results from hair confirm were negative. I took my pre employment hair test with some piece of mind and it was also negative. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LavenderGG

customer_reviews.title: Their results are not just in accurate but false.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve not smoked marijuana for over a decade. Yet, the test came back positive for THC. This is totally 100% false. TOTAL WASTE OF MY HARD EARNED MONEY. I administered the test to see if my prescriptions of hydrocodone had completely left my system.
customer_reviews.author: Lo-jon

customer_reviews.title: Test does not work
customer_reviews.text: My son is an occastional smoker and This test tested him negative after he had not smoked for a month. So why 2 days later did his company’s test was positive. Does not work so don’t waste your money like I did.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate results- do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I sent it off knowing that it should come up positive for THC, but I had been treating my hair and was hopeful I had effectively removed it. It came back negative. I felt confident that I could take the real test. Failed big time. Screen for all Cannabinoids is set at 1pg/ml. Well my metabolite confirm was over 1pg itself. That means it should have been dramatically positive with the initial screen. Big consequences came with the positive result. Just obstain and wait 6 months. If you wait 3 months you risk it still being there. If you don't have that time, then don't take the test. You will fail plain and simple.
customer_reviews.author: MadPositive

customer_reviews.title: Worthless POS.
customer_reviews.text: Total ripoff!!! Didn't realize this is just a kit to collect a sample. You then have to mail it in the a lab to get tested for an additional $59 plus the shipping cost!!? You gotta be f***ing kidding me!!! And there are no refunds. What a scam. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Good service, very quick
customer_reviews.text: Good service, very quick. Its really ugly to loose the test barcode or ID... there is no option to recover results if you loose the password and loose the test... dead end.
customer_reviews.author: Ganianette

customer_reviews.title: Fast turnaround exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the hair test on a Monday and received it on a Wednesday. Clipped my hair and packaged it according to the instructions and dropped it in a FedEx box the same day. At 10PM on Thursday, my results were posted on the website provided. Insanely fast turnaround and couldn't be more pleased. I am now confident in taking my hair test for a new and better job. 5 stars contingent on achieving the same result with my new employer.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Kit is very easy to use with instructions that you can understand
customer_reviews.text: Received very promptly after ordering. Kit is very easy to use with instructions that you can understand. Results were given within a few days. Very satisfied with service and product.
customer_reviews.author: traveling_tilly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, fast results
customer_reviews.text: I've used these kits for my Private Investigation business to give parents peace of mind in contentious child custody disputes. I've found these tests to be simple, fast, and reliable. I'd highly recommend them to anyone who wants a definitive yes/no answer, without the expense of a full blown lab analysis.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Tilson

customer_reviews.title: I believe that the test is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: The test could not be accurate. I know the person was on certain prescribed meds they take everyday. The test said there where none found. So not sure how they test but in my opinion it is not accurate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hidden cost
customer_reviews.text: Know that when you’re buying this, there is an extra $59.95 fee they don’t mention. The test itself is useless unless you pay the fee. I think it’s probably better to pay the $80 and get it done professionally self-pay
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W

customer_reviews.title: DONT DO IT!
customer_reviews.text: This product will not provide accurate results. The amount of hair necessary is not provided. Hair follicle tests will show any drugs taken in 90 days.
customer_reviews.author: SuperRN

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement & third party seller. Fighting for refund
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this item. It is a third-party seller. I attempted to use this and my results were completely incorrect. I went to three other places and had the exact results that were correct. This is also a third-party seller so they are no returns. Still fighting Amazon to get a refund;(
customer_reviews.author: MiShMiSh

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT. Have a hair test coming up for a new job and my results came back negative. Best product to give me piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: kali

customer_reviews.title: as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked as advertised. Results were prompt and easy to read. Directions could have been a little clearer, but used a YouTube demo to make sure I was following the right procedure.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what the description says it is. Very easy, detailed directions to follow. Takes very little time really and let me say it again, it's very easy to use. I would recommend this product to my Grandma. Really.
customer_reviews.author: Lucie Mays

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product to get a fool proof analysis of any substance abuse. I do random drug tests on my recovering addicted daughter because I am raising her child. As long as the tests come back negative they are allowed unsupervised visits. This is a fast and accurate test. The addicts know how to fool the urine tests so this is a much better way to get an accurate test report.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Gutcheon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This company is a scam. They have terrible customer support and not to mention the 60 fee. Do not buy this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and worked great for testing without our daughter knowing very accurate
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wearley

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for meth
customer_reviews.text: Did not test postive for someone I know uses marijuana, but that is not what we bought it to confirm. Would not recommend if u are searching for marijuana.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Clear instructions. Accurate. Results came in time.
customer_reviews.author: Migs

customer_reviews.title: Great testing kit!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this test twice now and they are great about getting the results right back to me. So appreciate the quick service. Product is easy to use and the complete package. Accurate results.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: Good Piece of Mind
customer_reviews.text: Great product for piece of mind. Easy to use, just make sure to keep track of which side of cut hair are the roots. We mailed on Monday and results were posted on Friday. Keep in mind, some types of marijuana don't show up in hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rylie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: SCAM
customer_reviews.text: Never got my results. Can't get through to customer service. This is a SCAM, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: David Gaskin

customer_reviews.title: Easiest hair test I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: The test arrived on time a little crushed but the test itself was easy to use and instructions were very helpful I got the results back in less than a week and an easy guide on how to decipher the results. If ever needed again I would buy the same test
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product, fast results
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use and fast/accurate results! The results came out as expected and took less than a week from the time I shipped them in. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SusanS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy instructions and fair price. Hopeing for accuracy Got results sure where a substance came from
customer_reviews.author: Leah S

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive a barcode with kit to see resultant
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This was great. It confirmed exactly what I had suspicion of. I even talked to someone about the high level the test reported. Very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Slocum

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: This test was super is easy to do and I got the results super fast. I did the test on Monday, mailed it on Tuesday and had the results in my email on Friday. The website was easy to use and understand. I would highly recommend this test.
customer_reviews.author: A. Farlaino

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate, do not recommend for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product gave false negative results. The price is super high to have false negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Lawlib4632

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT AN ACTUAL HOME TEST. YOU HAVE TO SEND IT OFF!!!!!!!!! They will not refund you.
customer_reviews.author: tempestt lamison

customer_reviews.title: i would recommend anyone for reliable hair drug test
customer_reviews.text: I foudf this product after lot of research, this hair test is within budget and it looks very professional. And turn around time is fast, and online result is clear, i would recommend anyone for reliable hair drug test!
customer_reviews.author: Qian Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Easy and accurate response time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very descriptive. Process and timing listed on the box are very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Denay

customer_reviews.title: Negative
customer_reviews.text: I bought it. Results came in negative after 3 business after shipment. Hair screening test for job came negative as well. Got the job offer!
customer_reviews.author: ALM

customer_reviews.title: Beware: you have to pay to send to lab
customer_reviews.text: You buy the kit and have to pay $59 to send to a lab.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Orsbur

customer_reviews.title: Was fast and great. Report not accepted by the courts
customer_reviews.text: Was fast and great. Report not accepted by the courts.
customer_reviews.author: Dogboy501

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Received my product quickly and followed the instructions. Very easy to follow instructions and the process was very quick overall. Within 4 business days after shipping (2 after receipt by the lab), I had my results- I passed! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use test
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and was very easy to use. We also received results/feedback within a week after mailing in a sample. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Doone

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Really easy instructions and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Really easy instructions and easy to use. Really fast and accurate results as well! Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: CAN NOT RETURN
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied because we were not able to return it, we did not get to use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use, and the most reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Rinsky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was quick and simple, easy instructions and awesome service!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I sent in arm pit hair for specimen from right arm got results back on Sept. 5. They were negative on everything. I was testing to see if it would show thc. Took job offer in October tested on October 19 results came back positive for thc. Lost job and reputation. Not a good product..
customer_reviews.author: Luis Palomino

customer_reviews.title: This kit was easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This kit was easy to use. Packaging and shipping was easy. Results was fast. It was very convenient when the results was in that you received an email. Great kit to get if you are needing to check up on your teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Its a yes from me! 👍
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in quite the hirry and it showed up two days later. Instructions were easy to follow the overall process was very simple. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great. Keeps my son in check and my wife at ease.
customer_reviews.author: VPB

customer_reviews.title: Easy cheap and discreet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Product came fast. Cheaper than doing it in a facility. Very discreet and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: the box comes with materials to place the hair inside and a small directions book easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product to test upon myself for a upcoming union job. the box comes with materials to place the hair inside and a small directions book easy to understand. The bad thing is how much hair they ask for and it needs to be from the roots of your head and not the tips side. They want minimum of 120 strains of hair which is a lot in my opinion. you mail it with the envelope that came with. Afterwards create account in their website and wait for the results like I am now. that it can take up to 10 days
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Simple and fast I got my results within a week
customer_reviews.author: tiffanie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, fast results!
customer_reviews.text: The test was really easy to use and the results came back quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery... Fair price that includes lab fees.... Easy instructions s
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was accurate and the results came back fast enough!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: not as clear as expected
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and the information is misleading. It makes you believe that 90 hair strands are sufficient, but then it turns out that they are not. If you buy it, make sure you have a substantial quantity of hair or they will reject your sample and you will have wasted your money.
customer_reviews.author: G C

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Took a little longer to get results than I planned but that was my fault, I didn't account for the lab being closed on the weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Ann mars

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT work. Do not trust this test. Waist of money. We knew for a fact that the person being test had consumed at least one of the 7 items tests for in less than 60 days. All test results came back negative.
customer_reviews.author: Vermont Based

customer_reviews.title: Very good. Got my results quick
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Results came fast,just make sure you create an account with HairConfirm. The test is also very simple and easy to use. Thanks :> A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: Lenzzzzzz2099

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and easy to use and ship back out.
customer_reviews.author: Megan R.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This test worked as advertised. I bought two tests and used them to monitor the levels of thc in my hair until I was clean. It allowed me to know when I was clean so that I could apply for jobs and helped land me the job of a lifetime. I do wish that the turn around time was a little shorter but the time waiting is mostly so the sample can get back to the lab. Once they have the sample you get your results shortly. Just wish it had a rush delivery on the prepaid envelope. Great product that works.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Everything came back negative. Marijuana WAS in the system of the testee. That means it was a false negative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Economical and reliable ; best bang for buck and fast and easy. Well worth it !T R 1 N 1 UP
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Persad

customer_reviews.title: Hair confirm drug test
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product was easy to use and the instructions were clear. The results were posted 10 days after we mailed the package off. I would use the product again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Codewoo10

customer_reviews.title: This product is useless.
customer_reviews.text: This test is absolutely useless when trying to identify drug use! I sent the hair sample in through Fedex with a tracking number on it. The results were posted within one hour of the lab receiving the package. I do not believe the sample was even tested. Don't waste your time and money on this product. It is not worth the traumatic effort to try and help someone in trouble.
customer_reviews.author: P. Temple

customer_reviews.title: This test is not accurate. Took the test and ...
customer_reviews.text: This test is not accurate. Took the test and passed it, but took an actual test and results came back positive. Can I get a refund for false advertisement and results?
customer_reviews.author: kia

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Lots of hair needs to be cut from the head. Therefore if you are wanting to discretely check a loved one you are concerned about with drug abuse you will not be able to without asking them to cut their hair
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Canipe

customer_reviews.title: Simple fast test
customer_reviews.text: First time using this test. It was easy to use and getting the results were extremely quick and easy. I'm giving four stars because I tested with 75 days of sobriety and expected to see a little bit of activity.
customer_reviews.author: Denise R

customer_reviews.title: Bought it and sent my hair in for testing, ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and sent my hair in for testing, results were negative. Went and took a hair test the next day for a job, and came back positive. Product clearly doesnt work as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoying Life

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It was to my home in 2 days. Very easy to use, and confidential. Easy to sign up on line for results. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were a little unclear; it would have been helpful if it initially stated/shown to place sample on "blank side" of foil. It was not clearly shown until you turn to the next page.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't let me know exactly how much drug was detected. Would be very helpful to know what the levels of the drug which were detected. Very expensive for just a sort of yes or no question.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Fast Results
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have used this product and I could not be happier. The results came back quickly and accurate. Will definitely use this product again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The directions were easy, and the results were fast! I recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Results were super fast and easy to understand. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: As posted, but with a different mode of posting but it was ok got the same process and results timely
customer_reviews.author: Rein

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a kit to test myself prior to submitting to a test that was coming up for a possible job. The kit itself was pretty simple though I needed a friend to help me trim my hair which was expected. I received the results within a week. I can't confirm if the results were accurate because I didn't end up needing another hair test but the peace of mind was worth the money. I would've given this 5 stars but I think they ask for far more hair than necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K.

customer_reviews.title: Took way too long
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this product on Sunday, received it on Monday and sent it out on Tuesday. It got to the lab on Wednesday morning at 9 am and still on Friday night... no results. We paid the extra money for the Express kit to ensure results fast but haven't gotten anything. And when we contacted the lab and Hair Confirm, no one was able to help. It was a complete waste of money for us!!!
customer_reviews.author: marsmana

customer_reviews.title: Fast, convenient and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Fast, convenient and reliable. This hair follicle test makes it easy to drug testing easy and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I know for a fact that marijuina should have came up on my test. It did not. Results for every test came back negative. The entire purpose of me taking the test was useless as it doesn't seem like anyone can trust the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were easy to understand and follow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and received it on time. The instructions were easy to understand and follow. I sent the collection off and received an email reminder when the results were ready; approximately 10 days. As advertised in all wasy.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas C. Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and the results are available online which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia S.

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: This product has easy to follow instructions and I got the results in two days. Quick and easy what more can I say?? I recommend it for anyone testing their children or them self.
customer_reviews.author: Raygo1

customer_reviews.title: Used it in pre employment
customer_reviews.text: As a small business owner I use this in pre employment screening Very simple to use and fast results via email and web links. Kit includes shipping prepaid envelope for sample back to the lab.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Adcox

customer_reviews.title: Totally Innacurate/Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I used this product twice with the knowledge and confirmation that one substance was used frequently over a long period of time. The point of the second test was to satisfy myself that I had taken enough of a hair sample. I was trying to ascertain whether any other substances in addition to the undisputed substance was used. Both tests came back totally negative. Hairconfirm customer service ignored our concerns. Parents are being lulled into a false sense of security and paying dearly for it. I would give a zero rating but your system is set up for a minimum 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: M. Samonds

customer_reviews.title: Very good but could use more info...
customer_reviews.text: I had to take the test to use in a court case and the results were accurate and fast. The only thing that would have been more helpful in my situation is using more identifying information of mine on the results form. The results are only identified by a generic test # and have no personal identifying information about the person tested.
customer_reviews.author: ItsOK...

customer_reviews.title: This test was a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This test was a complete waste of money. I have actually emailed them and asked for a refund. I knew for a fact the person I was testing had THC in their system for 2 reasons- they admitted it AND I also had them take a urine test the same day I cut their hair for the hair test, and the urine tested positive for THC. The hair test had them passing on EVERYTHING. Ridiculous. Worst buy ever.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Shoulders

customer_reviews.title: Hair Confirm Hair Follicle Drug Test
customer_reviews.text: Very good, fast results, was very satisfied with the product, clear instructions for collection and how to send! I would buy again if I needed it
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have known - "60-90 hair follicle test"
customer_reviews.text: Important information missing from "product features" - pulling out 60-90 hairs to adequately test...I was fooled until after the Test Kit arrived. Perhaps a bit more honesty about the products draw back would be appreciated by the consumer. A better product name could be "Multiple" Hair Follicle Drug Test.
customer_reviews.author: fooled me

customer_reviews.title: It arrived no problem! Was everything I expected it ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived no problem! Was everything I expected it to be BUT...I could NOT get my son's wife to take it! So, I assumed it to be an automatic negative and had to end her unsupervised weekend visitation visits with her four kids that I have custody of!
customer_reviews.author: michalle

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: I am familiar with hair official testing as it is a part of my work environment in which my career path has lead me, I purchase this product after researching several other brands, I followed the simple instructions that were included in the package, it was very well explained in the included booklet, also this kit comes with a self address paid envelope so once you are done just drop it in the mail, wait about a week, check your results on line, this product is very good and trustworthy the price is a great value to get confirmed results.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Fast turnaround, Must create profile to view results?
customer_reviews.text: I'll spare you the details of the results, but I found them easy to read, and understand. The online process was fairly quick, and the testing was done in as timely of a manner as advertised. The only drawback, in my mind, would be the anonymity, or lack there of. You don't have to verify your identity, but you do have to identify yourself. That seemed superfluous. Otherwise, an all around positive experience. I will be purchasing again, and again. At least until the testee produces a clean sample that is. lol
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Kindero

customer_reviews.title: Hair test
customer_reviews.text: Accurate. I took this before a hair follicle test at work, I passed with this and passed at work as well. Only issue is whatever is provided for shipping made it take over 3 weeks to arrive to them, on the bright side after it arrived it was checked within a day or two so it was fairlyy quick.
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this to anyone looking to find out if someone ...
customer_reviews.text: The test came and had very thorough instructions. I received my results within a week and was able to see every drug they tested for. Would recommend this to anyone looking to find out if someone is using any illegal substances.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and did what the instruction requested and the results came back as quantity not sufficient and I sent in over 150 strands of hair, they only requested 100 strands. its easy for them to sell a product and when the sample comes in throw it in the trash and say quantity not sufficient, and you are out $90.00. Do not purchase from this company better to just throw $90.00 out the window.
customer_reviews.author: shelby miller

customer_reviews.title: We received the results quickly. It was helpful to ...
customer_reviews.text: We received the results quickly. It was helpful to watch the online video and read the FAQ. The results are reported negative if the quantity is 500pg or below. If someone was experimenting a couple of times, the results will most likely read as negative because of the low quantity. To me it would be helpful to see numbers even below 500pg.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Hessly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Accurate results takes about a week for results. The only reason I do not give it 5 stars is that I would like an easy way to understand what the numbers mean instead of just understanding the +/-. For instance, does the numbers mean frequent/occasional. I searched online but it is hard to find this information.
customer_reviews.author: C-Mac

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Tested negative on both this test and pee test at the lab. I am not a daily and usually not even a weekly smoker but there had been more than enough occasions for concern. I miss the hair but I was grateful for the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: The Rational Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Sent out and got results extremely quickly. Less than a day, but results were negative. It usually takes longer to confirm in case something came up on initial screening. Saved me a lot of stress before going in for the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: ljdhlawjd

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Shipping took longer than expected but results came quickly after arrival at the facility. I wish I would have bought the express version but I am overall satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Green Marino

customer_reviews.title: Questionable results.....
customer_reviews.text: I have taken 50mg of Adderall daily.. Figured my hair would polluted with amphetamines. Test did NOT come back positive for it. Questionable results
customer_reviews.author: Scooby Doo

customer_reviews.title: Not all info was in the box.
customer_reviews.text: Did not use for a few months. When we went to use it there was missing information. We were able to do the test, but not get the results. Wonder if this is a scam or a counterfeit? Certainly a waste of money for us.
customer_reviews.author: mc

product_meta.title: HairConfirm 10 Panel Hair Drug Test Collection Kit Only, 90 Day Detection Additional Lab Fee Required (10 Drugs Tested)
feature_bullets: Hair drug test with lab analysis screens for drug use as far back as 90 days
Tests for ten (10) drugs of abuse: Marijuana, Cocaine, Opiates, Amphetamine, Methamphetamine, Ecstasy, PCP, Heroin, Codeine, and Morphine
Collect hair sample from the comfort of your home and send to our lab for confirmation drug testing
Test must be activated on HairConfirm and laboratory fee must be paid prior to shipping to the lab
Anonymous and confidential, results are delivered through a private online portal without any personal information
